column1: spins in from round the stumps, defended.
sharp turn from middle and leg, looks to tickle fine but misses. Excellent take down leg, given wide though.
deceived in flight as he steps out to flick, played too early. Hit on the pad.
lobs off the inside edge to where a backward short leg would be. At the moment, he isn't reading the turn properly.
steps out and belts this back over the bowler's head. Got very close to the pitch of the ball and went through with the stroke. Excellent timing.
looks to whip this square, beaten. But there's too much turn.
defended from the crease into the leg side
drifts away from a length on off, deadbats it away.
movement away, the length is quite full as he lands on off stump, defended to extra cover.
late movement from outside off, squared up by the length. Beaten. Superb delivery.
flashes to get a thick edge that beats the slip fielder to the third man boundary. Saw the width, feet didn't move but went through with the stroke.
beauty! Leaves him late to whizz past the outside edge as he wafts at the delivery.
beaten again! Top class bowling. Late movement in the air, movement off the pitch from length outside off, Farhan clueless as he's beaten again.
steps out to belt this over the top but Coulter-Nile bangs it in to cramp him for room, defended.
hit on the pad as he looks to flick. Rolls to short fine leg
swept but the top-edge just trickles to the deep backward square leg boundary.
turns this gently behind square into the leg side.
right to the pitch of the ball as he drives to mid-off.
skids one on a length from middle, rushed into his defensive stroke.
works this to square leg, can't beat Maxwell.
pulled in front of square, splits the gap between midwicket and mid-on. Touch short, he got it high on the bat but it still had enough.
back of length on middle and leg, tucked off his hip to deep square
flashes to get a thick edge, down to square third man.
rides the bounce and then upper cuts this short ball to clear third man. So very nicely executed ramp. Used the pace superbly. Not sure why NCN is suddenly going short.
unfurls his wrists to hit this behind point, two to square third man.
wrists this short of length delivery to deep square.
clean hitting right out of the top drawer. Steps out and lofts this tossed up delivery over mid-off. Didn't get to the pitch but it didn't matter.
shortens his length, worked off his hip to deep square.
down on one knee as he swings this over the bowler's head, clears the ropes effortlessly.
sharp turn from length on middle, tucked to midwicket
looks to go long-off, but ends up slicing it because the ball drifted away. Gave it all his might, so he cleared the infield and then the ball trickled away to the cover fence.
gets on top of the bounce and turns to midwicket.
slower and fuller outside off, squeezed to point.
shortens his length, pulled straight to midwicket
dabs this behind point for a single
length ball skidded through, hit this high on the bat as he attempted a flat-batted pull, down to mid-on for a quick single.
steered behind point for an easy single
muscled and it clears the ropes at long-on. Fetched the slower delivery from outside off, magnificent strike.
so clever, uses the bowler's pace and then literally deflects this off the keeper's glove to beat short third man
turns this gently into the leg side
lunges forward and turns this into the leg side
steps out and mistimes this lofted hit off a thick inside edge to mid-on
chipped with the spin, on the bounce to long-on.
gentle tuck into the leg side, behind square for a single
sharp turn from length on off, worked to the legside
squared up but he manages to get a thick outside edge to short third man for a quick single
gets right to the pitch as he eases to long-off
squeezes this yorker-length delivery back to the bowler. Looked to go downtown
once again was looking to wind up and slog, but couldn't get underneath the flight. Bowled full and flat.
slider which he bunts into the off side behind point. Excellent start.
mistimes an attempted slap to cover. Looked to hit the gap at point.
worked with the spin towards deep midwicket, Maxwell had some work to do in getting to his left from the ropes.
leading edge that rolls back to the bowler.
drills this down to long-off
beauty! Didn't read the wrong'un at all. Landed this off a length and got this to turn away to square him up. Bounce as well. Superb
beaten by conventional spin! Beats the inside edge to hit the pad as he attempted a drive
bowled full outside off, driven hard to cover.
driven inside-out with the spin to wide long-off.
sees the batsman try and give him the charge so drops this short, loses his direction and fires it wide. Wide called.
full toss which he toe-ends on the drive to long-off.
works this off length to midwicket
steps out, but Zampa cramps him for room by drifting this in at a length, defended back.
rocks back and flat-bats this pull to long-on.
good length on off, and getting big on his body. Uncomfortably pulled to long on
overpitched on leg stump, and he meets the ball on the front foot. Nudged to cover
overpitched on leg, and clipped past midwicket to the man in the deep. Enough time to jog back for the second
slower ball, but spinning after hitting the deck. Babar misses the flick
length ball on off, and nudged off his pads to square leg. They scamper across for one
full on leg stump, and he goes down the ground to swing across the line. Misses, hits his pad, and the ball rolls away to point. They consider reviewing, but eventually decide not to
full on leg stump, and worked away to midwicket. Man from the deep sprints in, and that means they stick to the single
length ball outside off, and skidding inwards. Uses his feet in a bid to muscle it to long off, but mistimes it back
full on leg, and that's been slog swept over cow corner! Slower from Zampa, only 80.5kph, and punished by the new man
tossed up on middle, and drifting in. Quicker by 10kph. Tries to drive, but inside edges it to his pads
full on off, and he muscles a mistimed drive to long on for a jogging single
full on off, and smothered off his pads with the angled bat to the leg side
shorter from Farhan. He skips down the wicket and cuts square to McDermott in the deep
back of a length outside off, and turning inwards. Nudged off his pads to square leg to a ball that bounced extra
shart turn inwards. Back of a length outside off, and cut from near his body to the off side
tossed up outside off, cut against the spin off the back foot to the man at deep point
full on off, and driven down the ground to long off. They skip across for the single, and that's Babar's half-century!
Tye holds on! Farhan wanted the release shot, but couldn't time it at all. Loses one hand on the bat, and the mistimed slice goes to long off
lucky! Under cuts it through the keeper's legs. Skiddy delivery that came on too quick
another one! Chops on. Fuller outside off, and he drives away from his body. The ball zips in, and takes the inside of his bat. Massive wicket
full on off, and zipping in. Clipped off his pads to square leg
short on off, and he swivels well. Pulled to deep midwicket off the back foot
full on off, slower from Tye. Defended with soft hands towards the non-striker. Well deceived
short outside off, but not bouncing enough. He tries to ramp a cut to third man, but under-cuts the shot there. They walk across for one
full on off, and well timed down the ground. Tye can't stop it, and that's work for long on. Pakistan get to 100
length ball turning into his pads. Shuffled towards off stump, and whipped off the pads to backward square
length ball on leg, and he rocks back to pull along the ground. Almost takes the square-leg umpire! Hit with immense power, but he did well to duck under the shot
full on middle, and pushed to wide long on
over long off! Comes down the ground, meets it from middle, and thumps it right over the non-striker!
swept away to the leg side
walks down the ground, and punches to long on. A tidy spell from Short
good length outside off, backs away to make some extra room, and slaps a cut past the fielder at deep point! Superb wristwork
nudged off the pads to deep midwicket. Ball angling in, and nicely worked
full outside off, and Hafeez tries to carve this towards point. Straight to the fielder
good length on leg stump, and pulled along the ground to deep backward square. NCN does well with the slower bouncer
good length outside off, and he dabs a late cut to third man .They're not the youngest men on the field, but the running between the wickets will tell you otherwise
full just outside off, and caressed past mid off. Played softly enough for them to take the second
good length outside off, and cut off the back foot to point. Can't beat the infield
skiddy outside off, zipping into the batsman, and mistimed down the ground to long on
tossed up outside off, and Malik skips down the ground to convert the ball into a full toss. Driven through the covers, and played wide enough of long off!
great response! Slower through the air, and spinning away. Malik looks to nudge it towards the leg side, but the leading edge takes it to Finch at cover
full on off, and defended back to Zampa
full on off, and defended back to Zampa
offcutter outside off, and he plays a late cut right between Carey and short third man! Yikes. Too short, and Hafeez had enough time to guide it fine
ramped over the leg side! Full toss outside off, Hafeez bends his knees after shuffling across, and then the swing towards the leg side does the rest
given lbw, but reviewed! It's the legcutter, landing full on leg stump. Hits his boot. But is that going down the leg side? No contact with the bat, but going down the leg side. Well done by Hafeez
full and wide outside off, late outswing, and he's forced to reach at it. Slapped to deep point
full outside off, and toe-ended to cover
full and wide outside off, and Asif slaps this hard past backward point. Slower ball, and Asif dispatches it to the right of third man
full on middle, and muscled over the non-striker. Not off the bat's middle, and long on intercepts

holes out! A brilliant catch from Coulter-Nile. This was full on off, and in the slot. It's Asif's misfortune that he couldn't get it off the bat's middle. The fielder tracks the ball with one eye and ensures his feet are inside the boundary with the other. Taken in the Aussie-Cup style
driven to mid off, overthrow from the fielder allows them to steal the single
short on middle, and Faheem has pulled this down Tye's throat at deep backward square. Off the bat's top edge, and Tye makes no mistake despite the rain
full on middle, and he muscles a slog to the backward-square boundary. Man in the deep has to run along the boundary to intercept
slower ball, back of a length on off and coming inwards. He rides the bounce to pull along the ground to the man in the deep
deceived! Slower ball outside leg, and Imad's through his attempted pull way too early
good length on middle, and slapped off the back foot to the square-fielder in the deep
slower ball, back of a length outside off. Hafeez is forced to flat-bat it to midwicket
overpitched on middle, and glanced off his pads to fine leg. A bit finer and that could've been four
knuckleball full outside off, and he mistimes a muscled drive to long on
dropped by Carey and Pakistan reach 150! Driven outside off, and the keeper can't hold on after diving to his right. They scamper across for one, and Australia have done very well here
slider on the stumps, defended.
brings out the reverse, gets it past short third man. This was a touch short, he did well to get enough bat on it.
picks the bones out of this pull, beats deep midwicket. Too short, he picked the length early and gave this a wallop.
down on one knee as he slogs this with the spin to clear wide long-on. Imad went back to over the wicket and tossed it wide, Carey reached out, got underneath the flight and swung it away.

paddled to beat short fine leg, excellent work at deep backward square by Asif Ali. Umpires checking to see if he touched the rope while pulling the ball back. Umpire isn't convinced there was a full release off the ball as he touched the skirting.
pushes this length ball on middle, defended back.
pushed into the gap between cover and point
length ball closer to the stumps, defended back.
off the pad to the square leg region. Beaten for pace as he trued to tuck it away.

steps out but the bowler shortens his length and gets it to nip back. The ball deflects off the body towards the man coming in from third man. Excellent running to pinch two leg byes. Lazy effort from Usman Khan Shinwari
he's lofted this straight to mid-on. Looked to clear the infield but got this low on the bat, Hafeez moved low to his right to complete the catch.
good stop off his own bowling, hit hard, put his right hand out on his followthrough to stop that.

leading edge and it lobs to midwicket. Dolly of a catch. Hafeez drifts this in from round the stumps, Carey looked to nudge this into the leg side, closed the bat face early. This one just stopped on him a touch. Pakistan right back into this.
works this with the spin to mid-on for a quick single
stands tall and punches this length delivery to the edge of the ring at cover
worked with the spin wide of mid-on for an easy single
makes room, exposes stumps and cuts to point
steps out and squeezes the drive into the gap between cover and mid-off, superb timing even though he got too close to the pitch of the delivery.
punches this hard length ball to cover
gets half a stride in as he defends to short cover.
looks to whip this square, but the ball veers in to hit the thigh pad and deflect to short fine.
this one's been helped along the way to the deep square fence. Length, angling in and he had a hoick at this, got a thick inside edge. Into the vacant spaces.
punched into the gap at point, the fielder dives over the ball and they scamper back for the third as the ball trickles towards the boundary ropes.
punched back to the bowler, who stops it on his followthrough.
mistimes the sweep, one bounce to short fine leg
excellent stop at point to keep this down to a single
drifting down leg, he uses the pace to tickle this past short fine. Shinwari with the chase, too straight, easily done.
works this down to long-on
flicked but can't pierce the gap, straight to square leg. Made himself room, Imad followed him

was looking for a slog, the bowler fired it full and straight. Lynn was fully overbalanced as he tried to squeeze out the yorker. Managed to somehow. Can afford a wry smile now, wouldn't have had he been trapped plumb in front.
stands tall and punches to mid-off
walks across and bunts this length delivery to point
short-arm jab, one bounce to the midwicket fence. Superb timing, immense bottom-handed power
defends this back to the bowler.
class, quality, brute power, muscle and what else. Dropped short again, McDermott picked the length and swatted this away to clear deep midwicket
leans forward and bunts this to cover.
swept fiercely to deep square where Hasan Ali makes a royal mess because he didn't pick the ball early.
defends this back towards the bowler
makes room and forces this straight to point.
reverse paddle, gets it very fine and he beats short third man. Imad bowled this a touch full, had a lot of pace which the batsman merely used.
punched into the gap at wide long-off
worked into the gap on the leg side.

swept from outside off against the turn, but he only manages to hole out to deep midwicket. Fetched it from way outside off, no timing and he ended up dragging this. Poor choice of shot there. Wicket off his first delivery for Shadab and the game is back in the balance.
works this towards deep midwicket for an easy single
cut away to sweeper cover, off the mark.

eased with the spin to cover, takes off for a run even though the non-striker stopped after taking a couple of steps. By the time McDermott turned back, it was curtains. Three run outs, oh dear. You surely don't want to build a reputation this early in your career for all the wrong reasons, Australia in real trouble now.
slider which he punches to wide long-off to get off the mark
makes room and bunts this towards point.
beaten by sharp turn as he tries to drive, superb from Imad. Rarely beats a batsman in flight.
slider that cramps him for room as he tries to work this to the leg side, hit on the body.
makes room and slices this over cover for a single
length ball pushed through on off, squirted to point. Would've been bowled had he missed
punched to sweeper cover for an easy single
looks to work this square, deflects off the pad int the leg side.
oversteps with a length ball that has been pushed to mid-on. First free-hit of the series coming up
right into the blockhole, squeezed to deep midwicketr
driven off the front foot to cover
full ball angling in, and firmly fended off the front foot
full on off, and Marsh chooses to defend this towards cover once again
length ball outside off, and carved off the back foot to deep point. They jog across
full outside off stump, and driven uppishly through the covers with the angled bat. Enough time to jog back for the second
straight to long on! Backs away and tries to thump a full-pitched ball into the stands, but it's come off the bat's toe-end, and it doesn't have the power to go beyond the boundary
length ball outside off, and turning further away. Cut off the back foot to point
length ball on middle, and he backs away to drill a pulled shot to deep midwicket
full on middle, and smacked back to Shadab. The bowler gets his hands towards the ball, but it's popped out after hitting the palm
full just outside off, and driven with soft hands to cover off the front foot
tossed up on off stump, and he check-drives past the non-striker to long on
length ball from round the wicket. He covers the off stump, and blocks to cover
back of a length on off, and he pulls this square forcing the man in the deep to run across the boundary and intercept
over the wicket on off, and punched off the back foot. Straight to cover, but off the bat's middle
full outside off stump, and pushed with soft hands to mid off. He wants a single, but the fielder is quick to pounce onto it
good length on off, and thumped off the back foot past the non-striker. Long on attacks the ball and ensures there's no second
good length on off, and drilled off the back foot to long on. They jog across for one. Marsh will keep strike
full on leg, nad he walks down the ground before smashing this to long on for another single
good length outside off. Spinning away from Short, and punched to wide long off. Pakistan won't mind these
straight as an arrow! Full on middle, and he backs away to make some room. Then swings straight like a golf swing
wider from the professor. Length ball outside off, and slapped in front of square to cover
length ball on middle, and spinning into Marsh. Flat-batted to long on for a single
length ball on off, but skidding into Short. Too close to his body for the cut, but somehow manages to make contact. Dribbles away to point
good length on off, and punched off the back foot to long off
good length on middle, and zipping away after hitting the deck. Misses the flick towards the leg side, and the ball goes to Saifi on the bounce
length ball on middle, and he tries to flick towards the leg side. Leading edge to cover
good length on middle, and pulled off the back foot to deep square leg. They jog across for one
almost chopped on! Tries to cut, but too near his body. Takes the inside of his bat and bounces over the stumps
length ball on middle, and defended off the back foot to the bowler
length ball outside off, and the googly goes further away
overpitched on off, and drilled over the non-striker to long off
overpitched on middle, and Marsh cued up to smash that over long off. But it's off the bat's inside, and ricochets right onto his boots

chipped! To long on. Shoaib Malik dives forward to complete that catch. Length ball angling in, and cramping him for space. Can't free his arms, and he lobs it into the hands of the fielder manning the boundary
full on off, and spinning away from Short. Pushed off the front foot to point with the angled bat

swept! And swept hard. Full on off, and down on one knee as he slaps this behind square. Asif in the deep tries to dive and intercept, but the ball wins the race. Asif crashes into the security guard near the ropes too
back of a length outside lff, and turned off the back foot to square leg

back of a length outside off, and pulled to deep midwicket. But Shoaib Malik, yes that grand old man, runs to his left from long on and slides across the ground to take a mindblowing catch. He's 37, would you believe it? And is that the end of Australia's challenge

Shadab runs from point and whips the bails off! It was a yorker on off that Coulter-Nile wedged to point. He wanted the run, but Tye wasn't interested, and the fielder has enough time to sprint towards the batsman's stumps and perform the last rites
length ball from round the wicket to Zamps. Dabbed off the back foot to third man
yorker on off, and shoveled away to the off side
length ball outside off, and a wild cross-batted swing from Tye. Through under his bat to Sarfraz
full on middle, almost a yorker. Wedged to the leg side and they scamper across for a single

dropped at deep extra cover! Faheem Ashraf drops a sitter. Full outside off, and driven with the turn over cover. Not enough power in that shot, and Faheem had enough time to compose himself, but the ball just popped out
full outside off, and driven to cover off the front foot
full outside off, and driven with the bat's open face to point
full on off, and skidding through. Pushed to deep extra cover for a walking single
length ball wide outside off. Slapped off the back foot to the fielder in the deep
good length outside off, and he walks towards the off side and pulls to deep midwicket. The ball dribbles away to cow corner
full on middle, and zipping inwards. Tye looks to nudge it towards the leg side, but it hits his pad. Hasan appeals but it's going down leg
good length outside off, and the pull is inside-edged to short fine leg. Only 113kph
back of a length outside off, and the ball stays low due to the lack of pace. Zampa misses the pull as the ball goes under
yorker on off, but shoveled away to towards the off side. Zampa is out of his crease, and Hasan races to his right and aims at the batsman's end. Misses!
good length outside off, and pulled in front of square to deep midwicket
nine down! Full and quick, and Tye's attempted drive takes the inside-edge and straight into Sarfraz's gloves. That went so fast, and the keeper had to dive to his left in a flash
good length outside off, and punched uppishly over point to the man in the deep
full outside leg, and Zampa backs away to drive. Straight to deep extra cover
full on off, and swung across the line over midwicket. Babar gives it a chase, and pulls it back before the duo can consider a third
yorker just outside off, and almost clips off stump. Lands beyond the wickets and goes into the keeper's gloves
back of a length on middle, and he tries to pull. Misses

full on off, and he swings across the line to long on. Shoaib throws from the deep, and Lyon could be run-out, but the ball has hit his body. No appeal for obstruction because the batsman did not alter his running path
Pakistan win 3-0! The 30th time they've bowled an opposition out in T20Is! Full on off, and he tried to muscle it over long off. No power behind that shot and the hosts are delighted
